description: A Pineapple&nbsp;Tequila Sour cocktail recipe is a delicious and unique drink that will have your guests lining up for more! This&nbsp;summer-y drink is perfect for any occasion. It's refreshing, fruity, and it packs a punch with tequila.
name: Pineapple Tequila Sour
recipeIngredient: Add a few shakes of cocktail bitters

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the tequila and pineapple juice in an ice-filled lowball or highball glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the tequila and pineapple juice in an ice-filled lowball or highball glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with lime wedges and fresh mint.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with lime wedges and fresh mint.
